About Me

Passionate front end engineer with an emphasis on modern web development technologies. Self-starter on a vigorous path of continuous growth while consistently striving to learn and understand various programming languages to create beautiful and responsive websites. Possess a B.A.S in Information Technology Infrastructure from UMN Twin Cities. Seeking to leverage my engineering expertise, strong collaboration abilities, and analytical thinking competency in the role of a front end software engineer.

Portfolio

TicketDream

HTML | Sass | Vanilla JavaScript | Webpack | Babel

TicketDream is an application project inspired by TicketMaster, a ticket sales and distribution company that allows its customers to search for and purchase tickets to concerts, sports, arts, theater and other events.

Live Demo Source Code

slickShop

React | Semantic UI | Context API | React Hooks | MongoDB | Mongoose | Node

Inspired by the largest deal-sharing community website that allows consumers to discover, shop, share, and rate the best deals and coupons available, SlickShop is a full-stack crud application project that mirrors a few of the functionalities.

Live Demo Source Code

OMDb Movies Database

CSS | React | React Hooks | Redux

OMDB Movie Database is a project that was built using React, showcasing React Hooks functionality which allows the project to fetch information from OMDb API, and Redux to manage state flow.
